reply.question: 1. Does the app declare the collection of data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, the app declares the collection of data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that data is collected from various interactions with the app, such as account registration, purchases, and user communication.
reply.reference: We collect information when you register for an account, participate in interactive features, fill out a form or a survey, participate in a contest or promotion, make a purchase, communicate with us via social media sites, request customer support, or otherwise communicate with us. URL: https://manmadeapp.com/privacy-policy

Privacy Policy
Revised July 2023
This Privacy Policy explains how ManMade Applications Ltd ("ManMade", "we" or "us") collects, uses, and discloses information about you when you access or use our websites, mobile application, and other online products and services (collectively, the "Services"), and when you contact our customer service team, engage with us on social media, or otherwise interact with us. This policy does not apply to subscription eligibility information we receive from and proce...

limits and conditions provided under law, we honor the exercise of the right of access or deletion for all of our users, regardless of their location. Any ManMade user may exercise this right by contacting us at support@manmadeapp.com.
Information for Individuals in Switzerland, UK and the EEA

your consent to do so.
Data Retention
We retain personal data for no longer than is necessary for the purposes for which it is processed, unless applicable law requires storage for a longer period of time.
Data Subject Requests
Subject to certain limits and conditions provided under law, you have the following rights:
You have the right to access personal data we hold about you and to ask that your personal data be corrected, erased, or made available in a portable form.

reply.question: 2. If the app declares the collection of data, what type of data does it collect?

answer.full_answer: The app collects information such as name, email, password, street address, payment method information, feedback and survey responses, usage information, transactional information, log information, device information, and information from third-party sources.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly mentions the types of data collected ranging from personal information provided by the user to usage and device-related information, as well as information obtained from third-party sources.
reply.reference: The app collects information when you register for an account, participate in interactive features, fill out a form or a survey, make a purchase, communicate via social media, and more. The collected data includes name, email, password, address, payment method information, feedback, survey responses, usage information, transactional information, log information, device information, and information from third-party sources. URL: https://manmadeapp.com/privacy-policy

reply.question: 4. Can the user opt out of data collection or delete data?

answer.full_answer: Yes, users can opt out of data collection or request data deletion. Users can contact ManMade at support@manmadeapp.com to exercise their right to access, correct, delete, or obtain a portable form of their personal data.

reply.analysis: The privacy policy clearly states that users have the right to access, correct, delete, or obtain a portable form of their personal data by contacting ManMade at the specified email address.
reply.reference: Subject to certain limits and conditions provided under law, we honor the exercise of the right of access or deletion for all of our users, regardless of their location. Any ManMade user may exercise this right by contacting us at support@manmadeapp.com. URL: https://manmadeapp.com/privacy-policy

Your Choices
Account Information
You may update certain account information you provide to us (such as your password, name and email address) by logging into your account or contacting us through our Help Center at support@manmadeapp.com. reply.question: 6. If the app shares data with third parties, what third parties does the app share data with?

answer.full_answer: The app shares data with companies and contractors that perform services for them, email service providers, payment processors, fraud prevention vendors, other service providers, social media services via integrated tools provided by the app, current and future parents, affiliates, subsidiaries, and other companies under common control and ownership, and third-party analytics services.

content: current and future parents, affiliates, subsidiaries, and other companies under common control and ownership

reply.analysis: The privacy policy explicitly mentions the various third parties with which the app shares data.
reply.reference: With companies and contractors that perform services for us, including email service providers, payment processors, fraud prevention vendors and other service providers; In connection with, or during negotiations of, any merger, sale of company assets, financing or acquisition of all or a portion of our business by another company; Between and among ManMade and our current and future parents, affiliates, subsidiaries, and other companies under common control and ownership; With your consent or at your direction. For instance, you may choose to share actions you take on our Services with third-party social media services via the integrated tools we provide via our Services; We also share aggregated or other information not subject to obligations under the data protection laws of your jurisdiction with third parties.; Analytics Services We allow others to provide analytics services on our behalf across the web and in mobile applications. URL: https://manmadeapp.com/privacy-policy
